tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount FLOAT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    policy_holder VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE policies (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_holder VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  premium DECIMAL(8, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
  claim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_number INTEGER,
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_amount DECIMAL,
  claim_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_history (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INTEGER,
  update_date DATE,
  update_description TEXT,
  update_author VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_analysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INTEGER,
  risk_factor DECIMAL,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_claim (claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   policy_id INT,
   claim_date DATE,
   claim_amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE policy (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   insurer varchar(50),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE claim_status (claim_id INT,
   status varchar(20));

CREATE TABLE claim_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  claim_id INT,
  claim_status_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  comments TEXT
);
